comments.html: To be honest I don't see the difference between embedding some logic in template and writing own filter for a single task. In both cases, after some time, one must check, what was coded and why. You may write more on less write-only code in any language and IMHO moving something from template to custom filter makes sense only if this part will be reused in other places.
